pages.about: Experience the Best Casino Equipment Rentals in Australia | AceRentalHub AceRentalHub Contact About Rent Menu About AceRentalHub - Premium Casino Equipment Rentals Welcome to AceRentalHub: Your Premier Choice for Casino Equipment Rentals Contact us Our Journey AceRentalHub began with a single goal: to bring the thrill and elegance of casino gaming to events across Australia. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | AceRentalHub Casino Equipment Rentals AceRentalHub Contact About Rent Menu AceRentalHub Privacy Policy Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to AceRentalHub. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information. By using our website or services, you consent to the terms described in this policy. Information We Collect We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and event details when you interact with our website or contact us. This information helps us provide you with personalized service and support. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect to process your bookings, communicate with you about your rentals, and improve our services. Your email address (e.g., acerentalhub@gmail.com) may be used to send you information and updates related to your bookings and promotions. Disclosure of Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties unless we provide you with advance notice. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. Security of Your Information We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you place an order or enter, submit, or access your personal information. All sensitive information is encrypted and transmitted via secure technology. Changes to This Privacy Policy AceRentalHub may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at acerentalhub@gmail.com. Delivery and Returns AceRentalHub offers flexible delivery options to ensure your event is seamless and stress-free: Delivery Information At AceRentalHub, we understand that the timely delivery of casino equipment is crucial for the success of your event. That's why we offer flexible and reliable delivery options tailored to meet your specific needs. The cost of delivery varies based on the quantity of equipment rented and the duration of your rental period. We provide a detailed quote at the time of booking to ensure transparency and no surprises. We pride ourselves on our dedicated delivery service, ensuring that all equipment arrives in perfect condition and on time. For added convenience, we also partner with major logistics companies, ensuring a broad reach and efficient service across Australia. Our professional team is committed to setting up the equipment at your venue, allowing you to focus on enjoying your event. We coordinate every aspect of the delivery process to ensure a seamless experience. Returns Process Returning your rental equipment is as easy as the delivery process. Our team will coordinate with you to arrange a convenient time for pick-up once your event is over. We handle all aspects of the return, ensuring that the process is quick and hassle-free. Simply pack up the equipment, and our team will take care of the rest. Our goal is to provide a smooth and worry-free rental experience from start to finish. Should you have any questions or need assistance during the return process, our customer service team is always ready to help. Frequently Asked Questions 1. How can I get a price list for your casino equipment? To receive a detailed price list, please fill out the request form on our website. Provide us with the specifics of your event, and we will get back to you with a customized quote. 2. What types of events do you cater to? We cater to a wide range of events, including private parties, birthdays, corporate events, fundraisers, weddings, and more. Our casino equipment is perfect for any occasion where you want to add an element of excitement and sophistication. 3. How is the delivery cost determined? The cost of delivery depends on the quantity of equipment rented and the duration of the rental period. We provide a detailed delivery cost at the time of booking, ensuring transparency and no hidden fees. 4. Do you offer setup and breakdown services? Yes, our team handles the setup and breakdown of all casino equipment at your venue. We ensure everything is ready for your event and take care of the disassembly once the event is over, allowing you to enjoy a hassle-free experience. 5. What if I need to cancel my booking? We understand that plans can change. Please refer to our cancellation policy on the website or contact our customer service team for assistance with cancellations and any applicable fees. 6. Do you provide staff to operate the casino equipment? Yes, we offer professional dealers and staff to operate the casino tables and games. Our team is trained to ensure your guests have an enjoyable and authentic casino experience. pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions | AceRentalHub AceRentalHub Contact About Rent Menu Terms and Conditions - AceRentalHub Terms and Conditions Welcome to AceRentalHub. Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully before using our services. By accessing or using our website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. 1. Rental Agreement By renting equipment from AceRentalHub, you agree to use the equipment solely for the intended purpose and return it in the same condition as received. Any damage or loss will be your responsibility and may incur additional charges. 2. Booking and Payment All bookings are subject to availability. To confirm your reservation, a deposit of 50% of the total rental cost is required at the time of booking. The remaining balance is due 7 days before the event date. Payments can be made via credit card, bank transfer, or other accepted payment methods. 3. Delivery and Setup Delivery costs vary based on the quantity of equipment rented and the rental duration. AceRentalHub provides detailed delivery costs at the time of booking. Our team will deliver and set up the equipment at your venue, ensuring everything is ready for your event. Please ensure that there is adequate space and accessibility for the setup. 4. Cancellations and Refunds Cancellations made more than 14 days before the event date will receive a full refund of the deposit. Cancellations made within 14 days of the event date will forfeit the deposit. In the unlikely event that AceRentalHub cancels your booking, you will receive a full refund of all payments made. 5. Use of Equipment You are responsible for the equipment from the time of delivery until it is picked up by our team. Please ensure that the equipment is used properly and returned in good condition. Any damages or loss will be assessed, and you may be charged for repairs or replacement. 6. Liability AceRentalHub is not liable for any injuries, damages, or losses resulting from the use of our equipment. You agree to indemnify and hold harmless AceRentalHub and its employees from any claims arising from your use of the equipment. 7. Changes to Terms and Conditions AceRentalHub reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Any changes will be posted on our website. Your continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms and Conditions. 8. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at acerentalhub@gmail.com. 9. Governing Law These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws of Australia. Any disputes arising from these Terms and Conditions will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Australia. Thank you for choosing AceRentalHub. We look forward to making your event a memorable one.
